dish.title: Bruchetta
dish.description: Our bruchetta is made from grilled bread has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil

dish.title: Greek salad
dish.description: The famous greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons

dish.title: Lemon Dessert
dish.description: This comes straight from grandma's recipe book,every last ingredient has been sourced and is as authentic as can be imagined
